name: High Voltage
description:
Ale is an inventor. He made a group of robots that were hacked by a villain named Hank. Ale must get his robots repaired by throwing wrenches at them until they are back in working order and on your side!

This is a small game that was developed for Global Game Jam 2020 from January 31st 2020, to February 2nd, 2020.  

This game may receive updates in the future that will further expand the game, with more levels, more enemies, and a deeper story. Consider this a demo.

It has a unique 2.5D perspective, with interesting mechanics revolving around the theme of the game jam, which was repair.

Enjoy!

Credits: Frank Marinelli, Frank Marinelli Sr, Kevin Hernandez, Andy Hilaire, Tameer Conway, Mekhi Vaughn, Daniel Rattray, Nick, Andy Kwok
